subject: Records and Achievements
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Jagr, 42, scored in the second period to become the seventh N.H.L. player with 700 goals, and the third to hit the mark at Nassau Coliseum.
snippet: Jagr, 42, scored in the second period to become the seventh N.H.L. player with 700 goals, and the third to hit the mark at Nassau Coliseum.
